content: of 2 combine the two ends of threaded strands and use needle to thread the remaining the middle strand 3 pieces of yarn behind it braid for about 0 5 in/1 cm use a clip to hold split into 3 groups of 4 combine from different groups tie off braid with piece of red yarn knot braid for about 1 5in/4cm use a clip to hold securely and cut close to the knot tie off braid with piece of red yarn double wrap around trim braid to ensure the threads are held knot securely and cut close to the knot horns trim braid two 6in/15cm pieces of wire depending on the gauge may need to double up tape my floral wire was particularly thin so i bent the wire to triple it up and twisted them together to make a stronger support fold the ends in and wrap a small piece of tape around the wires to cover the sharp end - this will prevent it from snagging on the yarn place one end of each wire down the back of the neck and the opposite ends into the body above the braided tail curve the wires to a semi-circular shape to your liking use more tape to build up some mass on the neck side this will create a taper cut two long pieces roughly one full arms length of tan yarn and an equally long piece of red yarn thread the tan yarn on the tapestry needle with the back of the goat facing you insert the needle the back of the neck and bring it out under the horn on the right keep the yarn outside of the horns leave a long tail use the needle to bring the yarn down in between the horns and back to the outside carefully use the needle to wrap the yarn semi-tightly along the right horn making sure to cover the wire entirely as you go once you reach the back insert the needle into the body to the right of the horn and bring it out on the opposite side of the horn on the left bring the yarn up through the middle this time spiraling the opposite direction of the previous horn and wrap once you reach the head again insert needle to the left of the base of the horn and bring it out where you first inserted the yarn where the long tail is repeat process with single red yarn leave a gap between each round of red for a striping effect knot all 3 strands 6 ends together and use needle to hide knot in the neck for each limb the snout and body cut a length of red yarn thread on tapestry needle insert near the seam one row ribbons above the blo ridge and emerge one stitch over leave long tail and wrap around many times for body insert again one stitch before the tail and come out in the same space as
